customProperties.armorEffects: This armor is sentient, with an INT of 2, WIS of 8 and CHA of 12 (LE). When you would be subjected to taking fire damage, you can use your reaction to try and convince the armor to absorb it. Make a Persuasion check, and on a success, the damage is reduced by an amount equal to your check.
customProperties.weaponEffects: The weapon is sentient, with an INT of 2, WIS of 8 and CHA of 12 (LE). If you would make an attack roll with this weapon and roll 1 under your Critical hit range, you can try and convince the weapon to hit a bit harder. Make a DC 20 Persuasion check, and on a success, your critical hit threshold for that attack is increased by 1. On a fail of 10 or more, the attack misses as the weapon forces you to whiff your strike.
